comments.comment:
Muslim un kawadawath kumburu kotala jeewath wenne ne. Un karanne paththara bothal ekathu karala hari negitina eka. Namuth ape un monada karanne smart ekata andagena rasthiyadu gahannai loku loku weda karannai. Kisima idiriyak ne. Thamage kiyala deyak nokara pitasthara un awith raja karanakan balan indala dan hu kiyanawa. Ada hema town ekakama atapirikara wikunanneth muslim un. Lajjai sihala ape modayo thakathiruwo kasippui ganjai kudui gagaha thamange geni ganikawak karala jeewath wenawa. Ehema nethnam arabi kareta wikunala joly karanawa. 
Othana oya chandi part dana ungeth genu ki denek arabiye duk windinawa athda. Hambayange wanda pethtgata kalin thamange un thaman wihin wanda karagena yana eke wanda pethtga loku karagena ke gahanawa.
 Oya wanda peththa nisa jathiya wanda wenawa kiyala hithana unta berida genu rata noyawa thamange game thiyena kasippu karayoi ganja kudu karayoi thuran karana wedak karanna? Math rakusata wiruddwa negi sitinna? Moda kam karanne apema un misak hambayo nemei.
comments.author: Nirmala Pushpakumari

ponna pako....
ow.. ow... thopita uwamanawa sanhidiyawa kiyaagena sinhala genunge badawal wada karanna....
namuth hithapan bm... me de ube sahodariyek ta unaa nam ubata koyi tharam wedanaawak hithata daneyi da . ...?
yako ape gamata allapu gama sampuurnayen ma muslim.., 
eth e minissu jeewithe thiyena thuraawata me wage asikkitha balu wada karala na.
ape gewal walata awith ekata kaala beela yanawa, api e minissun ta waradak karanneth na.
e minissunge awuruddata api gewal walata yanawa. ape awurudu walata e minissu ape gewal wala enawa...,, 
yako... eeth mee wage thuppahi wada karanne na e minissu.
ehema nam kotasak muslim thopita moko e widiyata samagiyen inna beri.
thopi karana me balu weda walin neda sinhala minissu guti gahaganne, kadawal walata gini thiyanne....
hithapiyaw.....
badawal wada karala neweyi, samagiyen karana oni magulak karapiyaw yakoo....
api hemadaaama jeewath wenna awith na.
api kawadaa hari merila yanawa.
innakal samagiyen sathutin inna hithapiyaw.....,,
mata nam muslimun ekka tharahak naha, mokada' mage gamata allapu game inna raththaran watina minissu nisa. 
namuth me wage balu weda karanawa dakiddi mage hitheth tharahak athi wenawa., balu heththa.
